description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve issues related to secure boot keys, follow these steps:

1. Refer to the guidance provided in the following resource: [Updating Microsoft Secure Boot Keys](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/windows-it-pro-blog/updating-microsoft-secure-boot-keys/ba-p/4055324).
2. Execute the manual instructions outlined to ensure that your secure boot keys are properly updated.

**Details**:
- This task is a manual process necessary for maintaining system integrity under the secure boot framework.
- Keep in mind that proper execution is critical to avoid potential boot issues post-update. (LLM Synthesized)
